sentences.sContent: ...a poignant combination of beautiful surroundings and tragic history.
sentences.sCn: …优美环境与悲怆历史的辛酸结合。

synos.tran: 尖锐的；辛酸的；深刻的；切中要害的

remMethod.val: poign (刺) + ant → 说话带刺的 → 尖刻的

words.tran: 深刻地；辛辣地；令人辛酸地

trans.tranCn: 尖锐的；辛酸的；深刻的；切中要害的
trans.tranOther: Something that is poignant affects you deeply and makes you feel sadness or regret
